Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/Cermak
ShortDescription: #94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Marshall Boulevard, Cermak, then resume their normal route on California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Marshall Boulevard, Cermak, then resume their normal route on California.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near California/Cermak.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Racine
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to a sick customer.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
